articles.caption: A look at God of War: Ragnarok Release Date.  I normally don't post game releases but GoW is one of my fave franchises.
articles.title: God of War Ragnarok launches on November 9
articles.description: Sony Santa Monica has finally dropped a release date for the much-anticipated God of War Ragnarok. The game launches on November 9 for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4. Pre-orders open on July 15. In addition to the date, they also dropped a trailer, which shows Kratos and Atreus fighting off enemies. At the end, they¬†[‚Ä¶]

articles.title: Report suggests games market might see decline in 2022
articles.description: A new report suggests that the global games market might not be completely recession-proof, with a slight decline on the horizon for the year.

articles.caption: A look at EU attempto to regulate gatekeepers like Apple & Google.  The walls in the walled garden is being chipped away.
articles.title: European Union regulates Apple and Google duopoly as platform gatekeepers
articles.description: The EU has adopted legislation to curb the powers of big tech "gatekeeper" companies that can control access to application platforms.
